statements: DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE plant_id = 1 AND equipment_id = 101;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' AND maintenance_date = '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE plant_id = 1 AND equipment_id = 101 AND maintenance_date = '2022-06-15';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' AND maintenance_description LIKE '%oil change%';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_name = 'Generator A';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_type = 'Pump' AND last_service_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EquipmentMaintenances WHERE maintenance_type = 'Annual Check';
